${modID}:CeramicFish.NAME: Ceramic Fish
${modID}:CeramicFish.FLAVOR: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards and relics at the shop cost #b20 less #yGold.

${modID}:MawBank.NAME: Maw Bank
${modID}:MawBank.FLAVOR: Surprisingly popular, despite maw attacks being a regular occurrence.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, store #b
#yGold. Right click to smash open and gain all #yGold inside. No longer works once smashed open.

${modID}:Strawberry.NAME: Strawberry
${modID}:Strawberry.FLAVOR: "Delicious! Haven't seen any of these since the blight." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b7. At the end of combat, heal #b1 HP.

${modID}:Darkstone Periapt.NAME: Darkstone Periapt
${modID}:Darkstone Periapt.FLAVOR: This stone draws power from dark energy, converting it into vitality for the wearer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #rCurse, draw #b1 card.

${modID}:Pear.NAME: Pear
${modID}:Pear.FLAVOR: A common fruit before the Spireblight.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b10. Whenever you heal, heal an additional #b1 HP.

${modID}:StrikeDummy.NAME: Strike Dummy
DESCRIPTIONS: Basic and Common Attacks deal #b
additional damage.

${modID}:Girya.NAME: Girya
${modID}:Girya.FLAVOR: This Girya is unfathomably heavy. You could train with this to get significantly stronger.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first #b3 turns, gain #b1 #yStrength.

${modID}:Mango.NAME: Mango
${modID}:Mango.FLAVOR: The most coveted forgotten fruit. Impeccably preserved with no signs of Spireblight.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b14. Whenever you kill an enemy, heal #b2 HP.

${modID}:Old Coin.NAME: Old Coin
${modID}:Old Coin.FLAVOR: Unique coins are highly valued by Merchants for their historical value and rare metallic composition.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b200 #yGold. Whenever you gain #yGold, gain an additional #b5.

${modID}:Cauldron.NAME: Cauldron
${modID}:Cauldron.FLAVOR: The Merchant is actually a rather skilled potion brewer. Buy 2 get 1 free.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup brew #b1 potion of each rarity. Potions you find are higher rarity.

${modID}:Ring of the Snake.NAME: Ring of the Snake
${modID}:Ring of the Snake.FLAVOR: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.

${modID}:Tiny Chest.NAME: Tiny Chest
DESCRIPTIONS: Chests in Treasure rooms are more likely to be larger.

${modID}:Dead Branch.NAME: Dead Branch
${modID}:Dead Branch.FLAVOR: The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, add a random #yExhausting card to your hand.

${modID}:Strange Spoon.NAME: Strange Spoon
${modID}:Strange Spoon.FLAVOR: Staring at the spoon, it appears to bend and twist around before your eyes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 cards which #yExhaust when played, choose an #yExhausted card to put into your discard pile.

${modID}:Enchiridion.NAME: Enchiridion
${modID}:Enchiridion.FLAVOR: The legendary journal of an ancient lich.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose a #yPower card to add to your hand. It costs #b0 until the end of turn.

${modID}:Busted Crown.NAME: Busted Crown

DESCRIPTIONS: Future card rewards from regular fights have #b2 less cards to choose from.
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.

${modID}:Lizard Tail.NAME: Lizard Tail

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play your sixth card each turn, gain [E] .

${modID}:DollysMirror.NAME: Dolly's Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each combat is played twice.

${modID}:WingedGreaves.NAME: Wing Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first #b3 turns, gain #b1 #yDexterity.

${modID}:Orrery.NAME: Orrery
